function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate coverage of equity issues in the literature review","Impact":"Failure to address the structural determinants of pandemics and response to inequities","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive research on equity issues in the context of pandemics and urban planning","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, policymakers, urban planners","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Insufficient research on the role of infrastructure in pandemics","Impact":"Lack of understanding and policy development in addressing infrastructure-related pandemic risks","Mitigation":"Prioritize research on the role of infrastructure in pandemics and develop policy recommendations","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, policy makers, urban planners","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Limited scope for developing robust findings from recent experiences with COVID-19","Impact":"Missed opportunity to capture valuable lessons for future pandemic planning and response","Mitigation":"Conduct in-depth analysis of the experiences with COVID-19 to inform future research and policy","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, public health officials, policy makers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"}]}
